This module implements Nazo Puyo solvers.

Imports

../core, ../private/assign3, ../private/core, ../private/macros2, ../private/math2, ../private/staticfor2, ../private/utils, ../private/strutils2, ../private/webworker

Types

SolveAnswer = seq[OptPlacement]
Nazo Puyo answer. Elements corresponding to non-PairPlacement steps are set to NonePlacement.

Procs

proc solve[F: TsuField or WaterField](nazo: NazoPuyo[F];
                                      calcAllAnswers: static bool = true): seq[
    SolveAnswer] {.inline, ...raises: [].}
Solves the Nazo Puyo. A single thread is used on JS backend; otherwise multiple threads are used. This function requires that the field is settled.
